verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> to the LORD; <WH3068> for he is good: <WH2896> because <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever. <WH5769>
Let Israel <WH3478> now <WH4994> say, <WH559> that his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever. <WH5769>
Let the house <WH1004> of Aaron <WH175> now <WH4994> say, <WH559> that his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever. <WH5769>
Let them now <WH4994> that fear <WH3373> the LORD <WH3068> say, <WH559> that his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever. <WH5769>
I called <WH7121> on the LORD <WH3050> in distress: <WH4712> the LORD <WH3050> answered <WH6030> me, and set me in a large <WH4800> place.
The LORD <WH3068> is on my side; I will not fear: <WH3372> what <WH4100> can man <WH120> do <WH6213> to me?
The LORD <WH3068> takes my part with them that help <WH5826> me: therefore shall I see <WH7200> my desire on them that hate <WH8130> me.
It is better <WH2896> to trust <WH2620> in the LORD <WH3068> than to put confidence <WH982> in man. <WH120>
It is better <WH2896> to trust <WH2620> in the LORD <WH3068> than to put confidence <WH982> in princes. <WH5081>
All <WH3605> nations <WH1471> compassed <WH5437> me about: but in the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> will I destroy <WH4135> them.
They compassed <WH5437> me about; yes, <WH1571> they compassed <WH5437> me about: but in the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> I will destroy <WH4135> them.
They compassed <WH5437> me about like bees: <WH1682> they are quenched <WH1846> as the fire <WH784> of thorns: <WH6975> for in the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> I will destroy <WH4135> them.
You have thrust <WH1760> sore at me that I might fall: <WH5307> but the LORD <WH3068> helped <WH5826> me.
The LORD <WH3050> is my strength <WH5797> and song, <WH2176> and is become <WH1961> my salvation. <WH3444>

The voice <WH6963> of rejoicing <WH7440> and salvation <WH3444> is in the tabernacles <WH168> of the righteous: <WH6662> the right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> of the LORD <WH3068> does <WH6213> valiantly. <WH2428>
The right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> of the LORD <WH3068> is exalted: <WH7426> the right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> of the LORD <WH3068> does <WH6213> valiantly. <WH2428>
I shall not die, <WH4191> but live, <WH2421> and declare <WH5608> the works <WH4639> of the LORD. <WH3050>
The LORD <WH3050> has chastened <WH3256> me sore: but he has not given <WH5414> me over <WH5414> to death. <WH4194>
Open <WH6605> to me the gates <WH8179> of righteousness: <WH6664> I will go <WH935> into them, and I will praise <WH3034> the LORD: <WH3050>
This <WH2088> gate <WH8179> of the LORD, <WH3068> into which the righteous <WH6662> shall enter. <WH935>
I will praise <WH3034> you: for you have heard <WH6030> me, and are become <WH1961> my salvation. <WH3444>
The stone <WH68> which the builders <WH1129> refused <WH3988> is become <WH1961> the head <WH7218> stone of the corner. <WH6438>
This <WH2063> is the LORD's <WH3068> doing; <WH1961> it is marvelous <WH6381> in our eyes. <WH5869>
This <WH2088> is the day <WH3117> which the LORD <WH3068> has made; <WH6213> we will rejoice <WH1523> and be glad <WH8056> in it.
Save <WH3467> now, <WH4994> I beseech <WH577> you, O LORD: <WH3068> O LORD, <WH3068> I beseech <WH577> you, send now <WH4994> prosperity. <WH6743>
Blessed <WH1288> be he that comes <WH935> in the name <WH8034> of the LORD: <WH3068> we have blessed <WH1288> you out of the house <WH1004> of the LORD. <WH3068>
God <WH410> is the LORD, <WH3068> which has showed us light: <WH216> bind <WH631> the sacrifice <WH2282> with cords, <WH5688> even to the horns <WH7161> of the altar. <WH4196>
You are my God, <WH410> and I will praise <WH3034> you: you are my God, <WH430> I will exalt <WH7311> you.
O give thanks <WH3034> to the LORD; <WH3068> for he is good: <WH2896> for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever. <WH5769>
